MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the KA8 postcode area of Ayr. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:38pm. Our emergency response team have arrived at the West Sanquhar Road substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:45pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:34pm on 15th March 2021.
